subSections.title: Japanese
subSections.text: {{attention|ja|Still needs etyms & senses for ''sashi'' & ''shiki'' readings. Compounds also need expanding.}}

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=6|rs=土06}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|破%城%槌|は%じょう%つい}}: a [[battering ram]]

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Castle}} [[Image:Himeji Castle M4690.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|城}} (''shiro'', ''gusuku'', ''ki'', ''shiki'', ''jō''): a '''castle'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|しろ}} Derivation unknown. The ''shiro'' reading for this character appears in 794 when the {{l|ja|山背|tr=''Yamashiro''}} region was renamed {{l|ja|山城}}{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}, keeping the old reading and thus applying the ''shiro'' reading to the {{lang|ja|城}} kanji for the first time.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kun|しろ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|しろ}}

# [[castle]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The ''shiro'' reading may be used most often when this term appears as a standalone noun.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ぐすく}}
Archaic Okinawan dialect term. The final ''ku'' may be cognate with mainland Japanese ''ki'' (see below).

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ぐすく}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ぐすく}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ぐすく|obsolete}} [[castle]]
#* '''1531-1623''': [[w:Omoro Sōshi|Omoro Sōshi]]
#*: 一 聞得大君ぎや 降れて 遊びよわれば 天が下 平らげて ちよわれ 又 鳴響む精高子が 又 首里杜'''ぐすく''' 真玉杜'''ぐすく'''

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Not used in isolation in modern Japanese. This term remains as an element in various place names.

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|き}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|しき}}
Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=しき|石|tr1=shi|t1=stone|城|tr2=ki|t2=castle, fortress}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kun|しき}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-l|磯城}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|しき}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=しき|archaic}} a [[castle]], a [[fortress]]

subSections.title: Etymology 5
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=goon|じょう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
See also
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|宮|みや}}: [[palace]]
* {{ja-r|殿|との}}: [[palace]], [[hall]]
* {{ja-r|宮%殿|きゅう%でん}}: [[palace]]
* {{ja-r|城%郭|じょう%かく}}: [[castle]]
* {{ja-r|砦|とりで}}: [[fortress]]
